selkies-project/selkies

Low-latency Linux remote desktop in a browser

View on index

Related repos

  • Low latency remote desktop and game streaming stack for Linux
  • Multiplayer framework for Node.js with SDKs for Web, Unity, and more
  • Browser-based Linux VM runs x86 binaries, streams disk blocks on demand, supports persistent storage and private networking via Tailscale
  • personal cloud server for syncing and running web apps
  • web UI for running Ansible, Terraform, and scripts
  • Remote desktop app for self-hosting and accessing devices
  • Self-hosted server for a messaging browser
  • Temporary Linux systems with webshell access in browsers
  • Web interface for RemoteApps and Desktops
  • Cloud-based internet OS for files, apps, and web development
